QuestData.Title: Taking Wing
QuestData.Description: The key is forged anew.$b$bNow heed my counsel, $r. Succeed in your endeavor or die trying, for if a single scale falls from one of my drakes I shall hold you personally accountable.$b$bNow, off with you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Give Salrand's Key to Warmage Anzim when you are ready to free Evanor.
QuestData.RewardText: This is it, the key is ours!
